Name: Merging Cubes
About the game: Merging Cubes is a unique puzzle game with simple but really addictive gameplay. Your goal is very simple. You have to find same tiles and make them disappear. Once the last pair is gone, you win. Quite simple, right? But what would you say if it's a 50x50x50 cube with precisely 125000 tiles? Quite a challenge! You can play challenge, timer and free modes. Choose you own playthrough! Features: Addictive gameplay with objects finding and merging mechanics Levels with thousands puzzle pieces at the same time Three game modes for your choice 200 levels to complete in challenge and timer mode Fancy graphics with pixel tiles, simplified UI and various visual settings Steam achievements and global leaderboard Merging Cubes is a game that you don't want to close after launch. Are you ready to try something really addictive?
